name: Jessica Lee
persona: Jessica Lee is a 20-year-old psychology major with a CGPA of 3.12. She is motivated to achieve good grades and demonstrates perseverance, even when coursework becomes challenging. Jessica manages her time fairly well and believes in her ability to succeed academically, although she sometimes struggles with self-discipline and mild test anxiety. She is determined to improve her study habits and is actively seeking ways to enhance her academic performance.
